name: Final Front Planetary Defence
description:
Defend your planet from the Aliens who want to bulldoze your planet to make way for a Warpmart!

Instructions

Survive as long as you can, fighting against hordes of enemies trying to destroy your planet!

Controls

1 - 5 - Select Units To Buy,

A/D - Rotate Planet (If you have at least 1 thruster),

Left Mouse Button - Spawn Selected Unit,

Right Mouse Button - Cancel Selected Unit Spawn,

Spacebar - Toggle Time Speed,
